item.title: The Address has been accumulating 561,000 LINK tokens for the past 11 days, currently sitting on an unrealized gain of $1,431,000.
item.description: On August 28th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), three addresses accumulated 561,000 LINK tokens 11 days ago. Currently, they have an unrealized gain of $1.431 million. The details are as follows:· Address 0x42B...6bbf6: On August 17th, it acquired 210,000 LINK tokens at an average price of $23.94 ($5.06 million). Currently, it has an unrealized gain of $303,000.· Address 0xCEd...837b9: On August 17th, it bought 276,000 LINK tokens on-chain at an average price of $22.12 ($6.63 million). Currently, it has an unrealized gain of $900,000.· Address 0x61b...00EC3: On August 17th, it purchased 75,000 LINK tokens on-chain at an average price of $22.71 ($1.81 million). Currently, it has an unrealized gain of $228,000.

item.title: LookOnChain: Binance Alpha Lists MITO
item.description: On August 28th, Binance Alpha has listed MITO.

item.title: LINK sees a short-term price surge of over 5% after Chainlink's announcement of a partnership with the US Department of Commerce to bring government macroeconomic data on-chain.
item.description: On August 28th, according to HTX market data, LINK witnessed a significant surge of over 5% in a short span. It is currently trading at $25.3.Previously, there were reports suggesting that the U.S. Department of Commerce is collaborating with Chainlink to place U.S. government macroeconomic data on the blockchain.

item.title: The U.S. Department of Commerce has selected Pyth Network for on-chain economic data validation and distribution
item.description: On August 28th, according to official channels, the U.S. Department of Commerce has selected Pyth Network for on-chain economic data validation and distribution.

item.title: PYTH surges over 20% in a short period of time, following the U.S. Department of Commerce selecting the Pyth Network for on-chain economic data validation and distribution
item.description: On August 28th, according to HTX market data, PYTH witnessed a significant surge of over 20% in a short span. It is currently trading at $0.1415.Previously, it was reported that the U.S. Department of Commerce selected the Pyth Network to carry out on-chain economic data validation and distribution.

item.title: The U.S. Department of Commerce and Chainlink are partnering to bring U.S. government macroeconomic data on-chain.
item.description: August 28th. As per official information, the U.S. Department of Commerce is collaborating with Chainlink to place U.S. government macroeconomic data on the blockchain. These novel Chainlink data feeds will safely offer crucial U.S. economic data on the blockchain, encompassing Real Gross Domestic Product (Real GDP), Personal Consumption Expenditures Price Index (PCE Price Index), and Real Final Sales to Private Domestic Purchasers.

item.title: JPMorgan: Bitcoin Volatility Hits Historic Low, Price Undervalued Compared to Gold
item.description: August 28th - According to Coindesk, JPMorgan Chase stated in a research report that Bitcoin is considered to be too inexpensive when compared to gold because its volatility has reached a historical low. The report pointed out that Bitcoin's six-month rolling volatility has decreased from nearly 60% at the start of the year to approximately 30% currently, which constitutes a new low. With volatility approaching that of gold, Bitcoin's current volatility is only twice that of gold, also representing the lowest ratio in history. JPMorgan Chase believes that this makes Bitcoin increasingly appealing to institutional portfolios.Based on volatility-adjusted calculations, Bitcoin's market capitalization would need to increase by 13%, with a price of around $126,000, in order to be in line with gold's $5 trillion private investment scale. According to the bank's model, Bitcoin is currently undervalued by approximately $16,000 compared to gold, indicating potential upward movement.

item.title: The U.S. is planning to put GDP data on the blockchain, aiming to span across 9 blockchains
item.description: On August 28th, as reported by Bloomberg, the United States intends to place GDP on the blockchain and aims to cover 9 blockchain networks.

item.title: U.S. Data Strength Puts Pressure on Rate Cut Expectations
item.description: August 28th. The price of U.S. short-term Treasury bonds witnessed a slight downward movement. This was because the strong U.S. economic growth and employment data somewhat weakened the market's perception that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates twice by the end of the year. The U.S. second-quarter economic growth rate was revised from 3% to 3.3%, surpassing the expectations of economists. After the release of this data, the yields on two to five-year U.S. Treasury bonds increased by at least two basis points to reach a daily high. Meanwhile, the initial jobless claims experienced a greater-than-expected decline, which is a significant signal for the labor market.Sudra Rajappa, the U.S. Rate Strategist at Natixis, stated, "The data continues to indicate that despite trade uncertainties, consumers still maintain resilience." Rajappa pointed out that the front end of the U.S. Treasury yield curve is experiencing a "tug-of-war" regarding whether the Fed should cut rates in Sep

item.title: 「Brother Big V」 Huang Lizheng currently holds a long position in ETH worth 96 million US dollars, with a floating loss of approximately 380,000 US dollars.
item.description: On August 28th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD, "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng currently holds 20,899 long positions of ETH, which are worth $96 million and have an unrealized loss of approximately $380,000. The opening price was $4,615.73 and the liquidation price was $2,725.4.
